name: Spooky Traveler
description:
Spooky Traveler is an arcade endless runner about a ghost who needs hearts to continue his journey. Use the directional buttons to fly and collect hearts and see how far you can get.

You can play it on any GameBoy emulator on your PC! BGB is a small easy to use emulator that you can download here to run the Rom.

Development Notes

Spooky Traveler was my first attempt at making a GameBoy game using GameBoy Development Kit 2020 (GBDK) and the C Programming language. 

The Source Code is available here if you are looking for GBDK code examples!

Tools used to make the game:

  • GBDK2020
  • Tile Designer
  • Map Builder
  • Tons of great resources here to learn
